sentence: They  are  being  squeezed  into  smaller  and  smaller  areas  â€”  as  Israel  urges  Palestinians  to  escape  its  air-and-ground  campaign,  which  has  left  more  than  16,000  dead  in  Gaza,  according  to  health  officials  in  the  Hamas-run  territory.

The  U.  S.  demanded  Israel  declare  safe  zones  to  minimize  civilian  casualties  from  Israeli  airstrikes  in  response  to  the  surprise  Oct.  7  Hamas  attack  that  killed  1,200  people,  mostly  civilians,  according  to  Israeli  officials.
